entries.content: Session started with Moti - refreshing memory on Semantix project. Found recent work on thinking toggle feature with tri-state implementation in progress. Git status shows new ThinkingToggleOrchestrator.js and modular folder structure (dom/, events/, provider/, state/, visual/). Recent commits indicate work on thinking indicator levels and UI progress.

Created modern terminal container design in tests/design/terminal/. Simple, clean design with dark theme, no animations. Includes responsive layout, scrollable output support, and examples showing compact variant, long output, and error states. Uses monospace fonts and modern terminal colors (#1e1e1e background, #4ec9b0 for prompts).

Created Windows 11-style terminal design in tests/design/terminal/windows/. Features: tabbed interface with PowerShell/CMD tabs, Windows 11 window controls (minimize/maximize/close), PowerShell-style prompt (PS C:\path>), colored output (blue for paths, yellow for commands), git output example with modified/untracked file colors, error/success states. Responsive design with mobile adaptations.

Created delta memory for terminal container design implementation. Documented both macOS and Windows 11 style variants with responsive design patterns. User expressed approval ('love it!'). Next steps involve integrating these designs into actual bash command execution feature.
